title: Pasquils mistresse: or The vvorthie and vnworthie woman VVith his description and passion of that furie, iealousie.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: For Thomas Fisher, and are to be soulde at his shoppe, at the signe of the White Hart, in Fleetestreete,
notes: Dedication signed: Salohcin Treboun, i.e. Nicholas Breton.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
